content: "Mazepa" - Libretto Overview (Condensed to 650 Characters)Act 1: The opera begins with Mazepa, a young nobleman, falling in love with Maria, the wife of his older patron, Andrei. After a passionate affair, Andrei discovers the betrayal and vows revenge. Maria, torn between love and duty, is helpless in the face of her husband's wrath.Act 2: Mazepa, now exiled and disgraced, seeks to gain power. He aligns himself with the enemy and plans to betray his homeland to secure his position.Act 3: Mazepa's betrayal leads to a tragic downfall, as both Maria and Andrei suffer due to his actions. He faces the consequences of his ambition and treachery.
